titles.title: To provide for the establishment of Federal fleet refueling centers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Organization, and Procurement.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: 7/19/2007--Introduced. Requires federal agencies to install at least one renewable fuel pump at each federal fleet fueling center in the United States by January 1, 2010. Requires the President to report to Congress annually on agency compliance.
